hotels.description: Enjoy everything you need for a comfortable stay at Crowne Plaza Milan - Malpensa Airport, an IHG Hotel. Explore the cobblestone streets of smaller neighbouring towns or take a day trip to gorgeous Lake Como, before returning to your conveniently located hotel, equipped with onsite dining, business centre and gym.
